## BluePrintUniformValue interface

Represents a uniform scalar or vector value in the blueprint intermediate representation

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface BluePrintUniformValue extends IRUniformValue 
```
**Extends:** [IRUniformValue](doc/markdown/./scene.iruniformvalue.md)
